channel.title: web开发笔记 – Vue
channel.description: Recent content in Vue on web开发笔记

item.title: Docs: mintUi
item.description:
mintUi是饿了么团队开发的基于Vue开发的移动端组件库。使用组件库可以提高开发效率。

移动端/Pc端

  1. Pc端
    1. 屏幕宽度：width > 992px
    2. 操作方式：鼠标键盘(click、keyup、keydown)
  2. 移动端
    1. 屏幕宽度: width < 992px
    2. 操作方式：手指滑动 触控(touchstart、touchmove、touchend)

安装 mintUi组件库

  1. 方式一: 下载mint-ui的css/js/font 引入到html中
  2. 脚手架**(推荐)** 管理非常多的项目资源，
    • mintUi Ui组件库
    • axios ajax请求组件库
    • vue-router 路由组件库
    • vuex 状态管理

自定义一个组件

  1. 配置路由

    // 引入自定义组件
import Exam01 from '../components/exam/Exam01.vue'
   
// router/index.js 里的routes数组里添加
{
    path: "/exam01",
    component: Exam01
  },

  2. 创建组件 src/compoents/exam/Exam01.vue

    <template>
  <div>
    <h1>src/compoents/exam/Exam01.vue</h1>
  </div>
</template>
   
<script>
export default {
   
}
</script>
   
<style>
   
</style>

  3. 启动开发服务环境 yarn serve

  4. 浏览器访问 http://localhost:8080/#/exam01测试

使用 mintUI组件库

  1. 引入组件库（按需引入/完全引入）

    //main.js
import MintUi from "mint-ui"

  2. 引入组件库样式文件

    import "mint-ui/lib/style.css"

  3. 注册

    Vue.use(MintUi)

  4. 挑选组件库中的组件添加到你的自定义组件中

    <template>
  <div>
    <h1>src/compoents/exam/Exam01.vue</h1>
    <mt-button @click="handleButtonClick">Click Me</mt-button>
  </div>
</template>
   
<script>
export default {
  methods:{
    handleButtonClick(){
      alert('点我了');
    }
  }
}
</script>

消息组件

//消息提示
this.$toast({message:"",iconClass:'fas icon-abc'})

//消息框
this.$messagebox
  .confirm("确定执行此操作?")
  .then(action => {
  console.log("action :", action);
})
  .catch(err => console.log("err :", err));

//消息交互
this.$messagebox
  .prompt(`请输入姓名`, "请输入")
  .then(value => {
  console.log("action :", value);
})
  .catch(err => console.log("err :", err));

输入框

<mt-field label="姓名" placeholder="请输入姓名" :attr="{maxlength:10}" v-model="uname"></mt-field>
<mt-field label="密码" placeholder="请输入密码" type="password" :attr="{maxlength:16}" v-model="upwd"></mt-field>
<mt-field label="年龄" placeholder="请输入年龄" :attr="{maxlength:3}" v-model="uage"></mt-field>
<mt-button size="large" type="primary" @click="reg">用户注册</mt-button>

//设置校验状态
<mt-field label="邮箱" state="success" v-model="email"></mt-field>
<mt-field label="邮箱" state="error" v-model="email"></mt-field>
<mt-field label="邮箱" state="warning" v-model="email"></mt-field>

// 自定义内容（图片验证码）
<mt-field label="验证码" v-model="captcha">
  <img src="../assets/100x100.png" height="45px" width="100px">
</mt-field>

开关组件

<mt-switch v-model="val1">开关</mt-switch>

单选框 复选框

<template>
    <mt-radio title="性别" v-model="sex" :options="options" align='right'></mt-radio>

    <mt-checklist value='2' :max="2" title='兴趣爱好' v-model='hobby' :options="ophobby"></mt-checklist>

</template>
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      sex: "1",
      options: [
        { label: "男", value: "1" },
        { label: "女", value: "0" }
      ],
      hobby:[],
      ophobby:[
        '篮球','足球','跑步'
      ]
    };
  },
  watch: {
    sex() {
      console.log(this.sex);
    }
  }
};
</script>

item.title: Docs: vue实现todolist
item.description:
<div id="app">
  <todo></todo>
</div>
<script>
var todoAdd = {
  template: `<div>
    <input v-model='task'><button @click='add'>+</button>
  </div>`,
  props: ["tasks"],
  data() {
    return { task: '' };
  },
  methods: {
    add() {
      if (this.task  && this.task != "") {
        this.tasks.push(this.task);
        this.task = "";
      }
      console.log("this.tasks :", this.tasks);
    }
  }
};

var todoItem = {
  template: `<li>
    {{i+1}} - {{task}} <a href="javascript:;" @click="del">x</a>
  </li>`,
  props: ["task", "i", "tasks"],
  methods: {
    del() {
      if (confirm(`是否继续删除任务-${this.task}`)) {
        this.tasks.splice(this.i, 1);
      }
    }
  }
};

var todoList = {
  template: `<ul>
    <todo-item v-for="(t,i) of tasks" :key="i" :task="t" :i="i" :tasks="tasks"></todo-item>
  </ul>`,
  props: ["tasks"],
  components: {
    todoItem
    //自动 ↓  翻译
    //<todo-item>
  }
};
  
//创建todo组件
Vue.component("todo", {
  template: `<div>
    <h1>待办事项列表</h1>
    <todo-add :tasks='tasks'></todo-add>
    <todo-list :tasks="tasks"></todo-list>
    </div>`,
  data() {
    return {
      tasks: ["吃饭", "睡觉", "学习"]
    };
  },
  components: { todoAdd, todoList }
});
//初始化
  var vm = new Vue({
    el: "#app"
  })
</script>

item.title: Docs: Vue短信倒计时
item.description:
<div id="app">
  <button @click="send" :disabled="timer<60">
    {{timer==60 ? '发送短信验证码': `(${timer})后再获取`}}
  </button>
</div>
<script src="../js/vue.js"></script>
<script>
  var vm = new Vue({
    el: "#app",
    data: { timer: 60 },
    methods: {
      send() {
        if (this.timer == 60) {
          this.timer--;
          var t = setInterval(() => {
            if (this.timer > 0) {
              this.timer--;
            } else {
              this.timer = 60;
              clearInterval(t);
            }
          }, 1000);
        }
      }
    }
  });
</script>

item.title: Docs: vue分页演示
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge" />
    <title>分页</title>
    <style>
      ul{
        list-style: none;
      }
      ul > li {
        float: left;
        border: 1px solid blue;
        margin: 0 5px;
        padding: 5px 10px;
        cursor: pointer;
      }
      ul > li.active {
        background-color: lightgreen;
      }
      ul > li.disabled {
        background-color: lightgrey;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="app">
      <p>当前页:{{pno}}</p>
      <ul @click="change">
        <li :class="pno==1 && 'disabled'">上一页</li>
        <li v-for="i of pcount" :key="i" :class="pno==i && 'active'">{{i}}</li>
        <li :class="pno==pcount && 'disabled'">下一页</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <script src="../js/vue.js"></script>
    <script>
      var vm = new Vue({
        el: "#app",
        data: { pno: 1, pcount: 5 },
        methods: {
          change(e) {
            if(e.target.nodeName!='LI') return;
            var p = e.target.innerHTML;
            switch (p) {
              case "上一页":
                this.pno > 1 && this.pno--;
                break;
              case "下一页":
                this.pno < this.pcount && this.pno++;
                break;
              default:
                this.pno = parseInt(p);
            }
          }
        }
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

item.title: Docs: Vue双向绑定
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Document</title>
</head>
<body>
  <div id="app">
    <h2 v-html="msg"></h2>
    <input type="text" v-model:value="kwords" @keydown.13='search' :placeholder="placeholder">
    <button @click="search">百度一下</button>
  </div>
  <script src="../js/vue.js"></script>
  <script>
    var vm = new Vue({
      el: '#app',
      data: { 
       msg: `<span>百度</span>`,
       kwords:'',
       placeholder:'请输入关键词'
       },
      methods: {
        search(){
          console.log(`你搜索的是：${this.kwords}`);
        }
      },

    })
  </script>
</body>
</html>

item.title: Docs: vue底层原理
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <title>vue底层原理</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <ol id="nav">
      <li>
        <ul>
          <li>用户名:</li>
          <li>{{uname}}</li>
          <li>积分:</li>
          <li>{{score}}</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li>
        <ul>
          <li>用户名:</li>
          <li>{{uname}}</li>
          <li>积分:</li>
          <li>{{score}}</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ol>
    <script>
      var data = {
        uname: "小李",
        score: 3000
      };
      var arr = []; //保存虚拟dom
      function getChildren(parent) {
        var children = parent.children;
        for (var c of children) {
          if (c.children.length > 0) {
            arguments.callee(c);
          } else {
            for (var d in data) {
              if (c.innerHTML == `{{${d}}}`) {
                c.innerHTML = data[d];
                arr.push({ ele: c, d });
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
      var nav = document.getElementById("nav");
      getChildren(nav);
      Object.defineProperties(data, {
        _uname: {
          value: data.uname,
          writable: true,
          enumerable: false
        },
        uname: {
          get() {
            return this._uname;
          },
          set(value) {
            this._uname = value;
            for (var obj of arr) {
              if (obj.d == "uname") {
                obj.ele.innerHTML = value;
              }
            }
          },
          enumerable: true
        },
        _score: {
          value: data.score,
          writable: true,
          enumerable: false
        },
        score: {
          get() {
            return this._score;
          },
          set(value) {
            this._score = value;
            for (var obj of arr) {
              if (obj.d == "score") {
                obj.ele.innerHTML = value;
              }
            }
          },
          enumerable: true
        }
      });
      Object.seal(data);
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
